//int fx[] = { 0, 0, +1, -1 };

int dp[mxx+5][mxx+5];

int main()
{
    int n, m, i, j, k, t, x, y, z, ans=0, len, count=0, flag=0, tmp, mx=-1, p, q, sum;

    fre(i,mxx)dp[1][i]=i;

    for(i=2; i<=mxx; i++)
    {
        fre(j,mxx)
        {
            if(i>j)dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j];
            else
            {
                int ret=inf;
                fre(k,j)
                {
                    ret = min( ret, max(dp[i-1][k-1], dp[i][j-k]) );
                }
                dp[i][j]=ret+1;
            }
        }
    }


    sf(test);
    while(test--)
    {
        int egg,floor;
        sff(floor, egg);
        pf("%d\n", dp[egg][floor]+egg);
    }


    return 0;
}
